```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(WVPlots)

set.seed(34903490)
x = rnorm(1500)
y = 0.5*x^2 + 2*x + rnorm(1500)
frm = data.frame(x=x,y=y)

ScatterPlot(frm, "x", "y", smoothmethod="lm", title="Example Linear Fit", annot_size=3)
```
